I SAID, YOU KNOW WHAT I&#39;VE LEARNED IS HOW SMART THE PEOPLE ARE. BECAUSE THEIR RATING IS SO LOW, THEY ARE SO -- THOUGHT OF SO BADLY, IT IS LIKE HOW SMART THE PEOPLE WERE. AND I&#39;LL SAY THIS. VARIOUS ANCHORS, SOME OF WHOM TRULY DISLIKE DONALD TRUMP HAVE SAID WHAT HAS HAPPENED TO US -- TO US, I&#39;M THE MESSENGER, YOU&#39;RE THE IMPORTANT ONES IN THIS WHOLE THING, BUT WHAT HAPPENED TO US IS ONE OF THE GREATEST POLITICAL PHENOMENONS THEY&#39;VE EVER SEEN IN THE HISTORY OF THE COUNTRY. I DIDN&#39;T EVEN KNOW THAT. I DIDN&#39;T EVEN KNOW THAT. BILL O&#39;REILLY, OF COURSE I&#39;M ON HIS SHOW TONIGHT SO IF YOU GET HOME YOU WILL SEE THE SECOND EDITION. BUT BILL O&#39;REILLY SAID, THE SINGLE GREATEST POLITICAL PHENOMENON THAT HE&#39;S SEEN IN HIS LIFETIME. NOW HE&#39;S A PRO. A SMART GUY AND TOUGH. TOUGH. BUT THE SINGLE GREATEST POLITICAL PHENOMENON THAT HE&#39;S SEEN IN HIS LIFETIME IS DONALD TRUMP AND ALL OF US, THE WHOLE THING. WE&#39;VE BEEN ON THE COVER -- WE&#39;VE BEEN ON THE COVER OF &quot;TIME&quot; MAGAZINE, SO MUCH THAT IT BECOMES ROUTINE. IN FACT, THEY JUST TOLD ME, MR. TRUMP, SIR, YOU&#39;RE ON THE COVER OF &quot;TIME&quot; MAGAZINE AGAIN THIS WEEK. I SAID ALL RIGHT. IN THE OLD DAYS, I WOULD SAY THAT IS A BIG DEAL. AND NOW IT IS LIKE, REALLY, THAT IS GOOD, THAT IS ALL RIGHT. YOU&#39;RE ON THE COVER OF TIME MAGAZINE. I&#39;M NOT ON THE COVER OF TIME MAGAZINE. YOU&#39;RE ON THE COVER. JUST REMEMBER THAT. SO WE HAVE A LOT OF THINGS THAT ARE TAKING PLACE. WE HAVE A BADEN EMMY, WE HAVE AN ENEMY THAT IS DISHONEST AND A PRESS THAT IS DISHONEST. WE HAVE A GROUP OF PEOPLE THAT WANT TO GET ELECTED WHO HAVE A RIGGED SYSTEM AND WHO HAVE REALLY RIGGED THE SYSTEM TO A LARGE EXTENT. THEY&#39;VE REALLY RIGGED THE SYSTEM. SAY WHAT YOU WANT ABOUT BERNIE SANDERS, BUT THE SUPER-DELEGATES, THAT WAS WORSE THAN WHAT HAPPENED WITH US. AND FRANKLY, THE ONLY REASON I COULD WIN IS WE WON IN SUCH LANDSLIDES ALL OVER THE PLACE, INCLUDING IN INDIANA. WHAT A LANDSLIDE THAT WAS. AND WE LOVE BOBBY KNIGHT. DO WE LOVE BOBBY KNIGHT. OH, THAT BOBBY KNIGHT. I LOVE MY BOBBY KNIGHT. WE HAD SO MANY COACHES, GENE AND DIGGER AND BOBBY. WE HAD SO MANY COACHES. LOU, LOU HOLTS. WE HAD SO MANY COACHES THAT CAME OUT IN OUR FAVOR. I DO WELL WITH COACHES. BUT THE COACHES LIKE ME. BUT BOBBY WAS OUT HERE WORKING REALLY HARD. AND I COULD SEE IT RIGHT AT THE BEGINNING. THIS WAS GOING TO BE THE WATER SHED. BUT BOBBY CAME OUT AND I CAME OUT AND WE WENT TO A RINAS -- ARENA ARENAS, YOU&#39;VE NEVER SEEN SO MANY PEOPLE. MAYBE YOU&#39;VE BEEN AT SOME OF THE ARENAS. IT IS AMAZING. SO HERE IS THE STORY, FOLKS. WE HAVE TO STOP FOUR MORE YEARS OF OBAMA. WE&#39;VE GOT TO STOP HILLARY CLINTON, WHO IS AS CROOKED AS THEY COME. WE&#39;VE GOT TO BRING OUR COUNTRY BACK. WE HAVE TO MAKE GREAT TRADE DEALS AGAIN. WE&#39;RE GOING TO MAKE DEAL THAT&#39;S BRING OUR JOBS BACK. AND WE&#39;RE GOING TO GET ALONG GREAT WITH THESE COUNTRIES AND TRADE WITH THESE COUNTRIES. I AM NOT AN ISOLATIONIST, I&#39;M A FREE TRADER. BUT I&#39;M A FREE TRADE TORE MAKE GREAT DEAL -- TRADE TORE MAKE GREAT DEALS, NOT TO MAKE HORRIBLE DEALS. ONE OF THE PEOPLE STANDING RIGHT THERE, SAID TO ME, MR. TRUMP, ARE YOU AN ISOLATIONIST, AND MR. TRUMP -- AND I SAID NO. AND WHAT IS YOUR DEFINITION OF TRADE? AND I SAID VERY SIMPLE. I KNOW FREE AND I KNOW EVERY FORM OF TRADE KNOWN TO MANKIND. HERE IS MY DEFINITION OF TRADE. MY DEFINITION OF &quot;TRADE&quot; IS THAT I WANT TO MAKE GREAT DEALS FOR THE AMERICAN PEOPLE. YOU CAN CALL IT WHATEVER THE HELL YOU WANT. OKAY. AND WE&#39;RE GOING TO. WE&#39;RE GOING TO BRING OUR JOBS BACK. WE&#39;RE GOING TO BRING OUR MANUFACTURING BACK. YOU LOOK AT WHAT HAS HAPPENED TO THE MANUFACTURING SINCE BILL CLINTON SIGNED PROBABLY THE WORST DEAL ECONOMICALLY IN THE HISTORY OF OUR COUNTRY, NAFTA. THAT DEAL WAS SIGNED BY BILL CLINTON. YOU LOOK AT AREAS EVEN FROM HERE, BUT YOU LOOK AT PLACES, YOU LOOK AT PLACES LIKE NEW ENGLAND AND NEW YORK STATE AND PENNSYLVANIA, GREAT STATE -- WE&#39;RE LEADING IN PENNSYLVANIA BY THE WAY. IT JUST CAME OUT. I HEAR WE&#39;RE LEADING IN FLORIDA. I HEAR WE&#39;RE LEADING IN OHIO. I HEAR WE&#39;RE LEADING ALL OVER THE PLACE. AND THE RASMUSSEN POLL JUST CAME OUT, WE&#39;RE LEADING NASHLTIONALLY. BUT WE HAVE A LONG WAY TO GO. WE ARE DEALING WITH A DISHONEST SYSTEM AND A CROOKED SYSTEM AND A RIGGED SYSTEM SO WE HAVE A LONG WAY TO GO FOLKS, AND WE DON&#39;T WANT ANYBODY TO TAKE IT AWAY FROM US. AND WHEN THIS PERSON SAID TO ME, BY THE WAY, WHAT YOU&#39;VE DONE IS NEVER DONE BEFORE, CONGRATULATIONS, IT DOESN&#39;T EVEN MATTER IF YOU WIN OR LOSE THE ELECTION, WHAT YOU&#39;VE DONE HAS NEVER BEEN DONE BEFORE, WINNING ALL OF THE PRIMARIES, BEATING GREAT PROFESSIONALS AND THEY ARE VERY TALENTED PEOPLE, IT HAS NEVER BEEN DONE BEFORE, YOU WILL GO DOWN IN THE HISTORY BOOKS, MR. TRUMP. I SAID DO ME A FAVOR. DON&#39;T EVEN TELL ME ABOUT IT. BECAUSE IF I DON&#39;T WIN THE NEXT ONE, I WILL CONSIDER IT A BIG, FAT WASTE OF TIME AND $55 MILLION I PUT UP, AND I&#39;M STILL PUTTING UP A LOT MORE. AND NOW WE RAISED $51 MILLION LAST MONTH AND WE STARTED TOWARD THE MIDDLE OF THE MONTH. AND EVERYONE WAS SHOCKED. AND MUCH OF THAT MONEY CAME IN SMALL DONATIONS LIKE $71 AVERAGE OR SOMETHING LIKE THAT. AND I PUT UP MILLIONS. BUT I DID IT, LIKE, I WANT TO INCENTIVIZE PEOPLE AND I WANT PEOPLE TO REALIZE, I&#39;M RAISING MONEY FOR THE REPUBLICAN PARTY AND THE RNC. THAT IS WHAT WE WANT TO DO. BECAUSE WE WANT TO KEEP OUR MAJORITY. WE WANT TO KEEP OUR HOUSE. WE WANT TO KEEP OUR SENATE. BECAUSE I&#39;LL TELL YOU WHAT, IF WE CAN DO THAT, AND WE HAVE TRUMP AS PRESIDENT, WE ARE GOING TO BE ABLE TO DO THINGS THAT ARE GOING TO BE SO GREAT FOR OUR COUNTRY. GOING TO BE AMAZING. YOU KNOW, WE&#39;RE RUN OF THE HIGHEST TAXED NATIONS IN THE WORLD. AND YET IN GOING AROUND AND MEETING WITH PEOPLE, SMALL BUSINESS PEOPLE, BIG BUSINESS PEOPLE, IF THEY HAD THEIR CHANCE, AND IF THEY HAD THEIR CHOICE, THEY WOULD RATHER GET RID OF RULES AND REGULATION -- WE HAVE THE WORST REGULATIONS ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD. THEY ACTUALLY WOULD RATHER PAY MORE TAX, WHICH IS SURPRISING, AND GET RID OF THESE REGULATIONS THAT ARE CHOKING EVERYBODY. PEOPLE CAN&#39;T RUN THEIR BUSINESSES. SO WE&#39;RE GOING TO TURN THINGS AROUND. WE&#39;RE GOING TO TURN THEM AROUND FAST. WE&#39;RE NOT GOING TO LOSE CARRIER AIR-CONDITIONING FROM INDIANAPOLIS. YOU KNOW THAT DEAL VERY WELL. THOSE PEOPLE HAVE FOLLOWED ME ALL OVER THE PLACE. 1400 PEOPLE, OUT OF JOBS, VISUALLY THEIR MOVING TO MEXICO. ANY OF THE CARRIER FOLKS IN THIS ROOM? BECAUSE WE HAVE -- WE HAVE A LOT -- LOOK AT THAT. WHY ARE YOU IN THE BACK ROW. YOU SHOULD BE IN THE FRONT ROW. BUT WE HAD -- DURING THE SEASON, WE HAD SO MANY OF THEM THAT FOLLOWED US AROUND. THEY FELT SO BADLY. WE&#39;RE NOT GOING TO LET THAT HAPPEN. PEOPLE AND COUNTRIES TAKE OUR COMPANIES AND TAKE OUR JOBS, THERE ARE GOING TO BE CONSEQUENCES. THEY WON&#39;T TAKE THEM. BECAUSE WE&#39;RE NOT GOING TO LET CARRIER COME IN AND MAKE AIR-CONDITIONERS IN MEXICO AND SELL THE AIR-CONDITIONERS TO US, ACROSS A VERY STRONG BORDER NOW, WITHOUT CONSEQUENCE. AND WHEN WE EXPLAIN TO THE HEADS OF CARRIER THAT HERE IS THE STORY, EITHER STAY OR IF YOU WANT TO GO TO MEXICO, WE WISH YOU A LOT OF LUCK BUT WHEN YOU SELL YOUR AIR-CONDITIONERS, YOU ARE GOING TO PAY A 35% TAX FOR THE AIR-CONDITIONERS TO COME ACROSS THE BORDER. AND YOU KNOW WHAT IS GOING TO HAPPEN. THEY ARE NOT GOING TO MOVE. THEY&#39;RE NOT GOING TO MOVE. THIS GOVERNMENT WAS THINKING ABOUT LOW INTEREST LOANS, ZERO INTEREST LOANS AND WAYS TO KEEP OUR KPZCOMPANIES. YOU DON&#39;T NEED THAT. THEY DON&#39;T NEED MONEY. THEY&#39;RE MAKING PLENTY OF MONEY. BUT WE WON&#39;T LET THEM JUST TAKE OUR COMPANIES OUT AND FIRE EVERYBODY. THESE ARE PEOPLE WITH CARRIER FOR MANY, MANY YEARS. WE&#39;RE NOT GOING TO LET IT HAPPEN. AND WE&#39;RE GOING TO HAVE A COUNTRY THAT IS SO SMART AGAIN. SO HERE IS THETORY, FOLKS. WE DON&#39;T WIN ANY MORE. WE&#39;RE GOING TO START WINNING. WE&#39;RE GOING TO WIN WITH OUR MILITARY. WE&#39;RE GOING TO KICK THE HELL OUT OF ISIS. WE HAVE TO END IT. WE HAVE NO CHOICE. WE&#39;RE GOING TO TAKE CARE OF OUR VETS. SO IMPORTANT. OUR VETS ARE BEING TREATED SO BADLY. I HAVE SUCH GREAT VETERAN SUPPORT. WE&#39;RE GOING TO TAKE CARE OF OUR VETERANS. WE&#39;RE GOING TO HAVE STRONG BORDERS. WE&#39;RE GOING TO HAVE THE WALL -- OH, THAT WALL IS GOING TO BE AS BEAUTIFUL AS A WALL COULD BE. SOMEBODY SAID, MR. TRUMP, SIR, THEY&#39;RE GOING TO CALL IT THE TRUMP WALL. I SAID, WELL THEN I BETTER BUILD IT BIG AND BEAUTIFUL, RIGHT. NO. NO, I DON&#39;T WANT THAT. BUT WE NEED -- WE NEED GREAT BORDERS. BECAUSE WITHOUT BORDERS, WE DON&#39;T HAVE A COUNTRY. WE&#39;RE GOING TO MAKE GREAT TRADE DEALS. OUR JOBS ARE GOING TO COME BACK. WE&#39;RE GOING TO MAKE A LOT OF MONEY ON TRADE. RIGHT NOW WE LOSE ALL OF THIS MONEY. YOU LOOK AT JAPAN, THE BIGGEST SHIPS YOU&#39;VE EVER SEEN FLOATING IN, AND I WAS IN LOS ANGELES, THEY FLOAT IN THESE MASSIVE, MASSIVE SHIPS LOADED UP WITH CARS. AND THE CARS ARE POURING JUST LIKE -- I MEAN, NASCAR. I LOVE NASCAR. I LOVE BRIAN FRANCE. HE ENDORSED ME FROM NASCAR, RIGHT. NASCAR. IT IS LIKE NASCAR DRIVERS. KING RICHARD ENDORSED ME. A LOT OF THE GUYS ENDORSED ME. RICHARD PETTY. THEY COME IN AND THEY ARE POURING OFF THESE BOATS. WE SEND THEM WHEAT. WE SEND THEM BEEF. AND WHEN IT GETS THERE, THEY DON&#39;T EVEN WANT IT. THEY SEND IT BACK. YOU WANT TO SEE TRADE IMBALANCE, LOOK AT THE IMBALANCE WE HAVE WITH JAPAN. IT WILL END, FOLKS. WE&#39;RE GOING TO HAVE SMART PEOPLE NOW. WE&#39;RE GOING TO MAKE GREAT DEALS AND FAIR DEALS AND GET ALONG GREAT WITH JAPAN. WE&#39;RE GOING TO GET ALONG BETTER WITH THESE COUNTRIES AND THEY&#39;RE GOING TO TREAT US FAIRLY. AND WE HAVE ALL OF THE CARDS. JUST REMEMBER THAT. WE&#39;RE THE PIGGY BANK. BUT THEY ARE GOING TO BREAK OUR PIGGY BANK VERY SOON. BUT WITH THE PIGGY BANK, THEY TAKE THE MONEY OUT. WE HAVE REBUILT CHINA. THE MONEY THEY&#39;VE TAKEN OUT OF THIS COUNTRY, I MEAN THEY HAVE TRAINS THAT CAN HE CAN ONLY DREAM ABOUT. THEY HAVE HIGHWAYS THAT WE CAN ONLY DREAM ABOUT. PLACES OUTSIDE OF THIS COUNTRY IN THE MIDDLE EAST, DIFFERENT PLACES HAVE AIRPORTS THAT WE CAN ONLY DREAM ABOUT. WE USED TO BE AT THE TOP. NOW WE&#39;RE LIKE A THIRD-WORLD COUNTRY. SO HERE IS WHAT I SAY. WE&#39;RE GOING TO START WINNING AGAIN. WE&#39;RE GOING TO WIN SO MUCH. YOU&#39;RE GOING TO BE SO PROUD OF YOUR COUNTRY. WE&#39;RE GOING TO WIN SO MUCH. YOU&#39;RE GOING TO BE SO HAPPY. YOU&#39;RE GOING TO HAVE YOUR JOBS BACK. YOU&#39;RE GOING TO HAVE YOUR PRIDE BACK. I OFTEN JOKE, YOU&#39;LL BE CALLING UP MIKE PENCE, I DON&#39;T KNOW WHETHER HE&#39;S GOING TO BE YOUR GOVERNOR OR YOUR VICE PRESIDENT OR WHO THE HELL KNOWS. BUT YOU&#39;RE GOING TO CALL UP -- GOOD MAN. BUT YOU&#39;RE GOING TO CALL HIM AND YOU COULD EITHER SAY, GOVERNOR, OR VICE PRESIDENT, SIR, PLEASE, PLEASE SPEAK TO MR. TRUMP. WE&#39;RE WINNING TOO MUCH. WE, THE PEOPLE OF INDIANA, CANNOT STAND ALL OF THESE VICTORIES. WE CAN&#39;T TAKE IT. WE&#39;RE NOT USED TO IT. PLEASE, WE&#39;RE WINNING WITH OUR MILITARY. WE&#39;RE GOING TO BEAT ISIS. WE&#39;RE WINNING ON TRADE. WE&#39;RE WINNING AT THE BORDER. WE&#39;RE STOPPING DRUGS FROM POURING IN. WE&#39;RE WINNING ON EDUCATION. WE&#39;RE WINNING WITH OUR SECOND AMENDMENT. PLEASE, PLEASE, MIKE, HELP US. WE&#39;RE WINNING TOO MUCH. AND MIKE WILL COME TO SEE ME. AND SAY, MR. PRESIDENT, SIR, THEY&#39;RE WINNING TOO MUCH. THE PEOPLE OF INDIANA CAN&#39;T STAND IT. I SAY, MIKE, GO BACK AND TELL THEM, WE&#39;RE NOT CHANGING A DAMN THING. WE&#39;RE GOING TO KEEP WINNING. AND WE&#39;RE GOING TO WIN AT EVERY LEVEL. AND WE ARE GOING TO MAKE AMERICA SO GREAT AGAIN, WE&#39;RE GOING TO MAKE AMERICA GREATER THAN EVER BEFORE. I LOVE YOU INDIANA. THANK YOU FOR ALL OF YOUR HELP. YOU&#39;RE REALLY SPECIAL PEOPLE. THANK YOU. WE LOVE YOU. THANK YOU VERY MUCH, EVERYBODY. THANK YOU. THANK YOU.</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7580"></td>
        <td id="LC7580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That’s the choice we face. We can either give in to Hillary Clinton’s campaign of fear, or we can choose to Believe In America.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7581"></td>
        <td id="LC7581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We lost our way when we stopped believing in our country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7582"></td>
        <td id="LC7582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">America became the world’s dominant economy by becoming the world’s dominant producer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7583"></td>
        <td id="LC7583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wealth this created was shared broadly, creating the biggest middle class the world had ever known.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7584"></td>
        <td id="LC7584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But then America changed its policy from promoting development in America, to promoting development in other nations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7585"></td>
        <td id="LC7585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We allowed foreign countries to subsidize their goods, devalue their currencies, violate their agreements, and cheat in every way imaginable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7586"></td>
        <td id="LC7586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Trillions of our dollars and millions of our jobs flowed overseas as a result.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7587"></td>
        <td id="LC7587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have visited cities and towns across this country where a third or even half of manufacturing jobs have been wiped out in the last 20 years.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7588"></td>
        <td id="LC7588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Today, we import nearly $800 billion more in goods than we export.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7589"></td>
        <td id="LC7589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This is not some natural disaster. It is politician-made disaster.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7590"></td>
        <td id="LC7590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is the consequence of a leadership class that worships globalism over Americanism.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7591"></td>
        <td id="LC7591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This is a direct affront to our Founding Fathers, who wanted America to be strong, independent and free.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7592"></td>
        <td id="LC7592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Our Founding Fathers Understood Trade</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7593"></td>
        <td id="LC7593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">George Washington said that “the promotion of domestic manufactur[ing] will be among the first consequences to flow from an energetic government.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7594"></td>
        <td id="LC7594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Alexander Hamilton spoke frequently of the “expediency of encouraging manufactur[ing] in the United States.” The first Republican President, Abraham Lincoln, warned that: “The abandonment of the protective policy by the American government… must produce want and ruin among our people.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7595"></td>
        <td id="LC7595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Our original Constitution did not even have an income tax. Instead, it had tariffs – emphasizing taxation of foreign, not domestic, production.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7596"></td>
        <td id="LC7596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yet today, 240 years after the Revolution, we have turned things completely upside-down.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7597"></td>
        <td id="LC7597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We tax and regulate and restrict our companies to death, then we allow foreign countries that cheat to export their goods to us tax-free.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7598"></td>
        <td id="LC7598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As a result, we have become more dependent on foreign countries than ever before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7599"></td>
        <td id="LC7599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ladies and Gentlemen, it’s time to declare our economic independence once again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7600"></td>
        <td id="LC7600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That means reversing two of the worst legacies of the Clinton years.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7601"></td>
        <td id="LC7601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">America has lost nearly one-third of its manufacturing jobs since 1997 – even as the country has increased its population by 50 million people.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7602"></td>
        <td id="LC7602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At the center of this catastrophe are two trade deals pushed by Bill and Hillary Clinton.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7603"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7604"></td>
        <td id="LC7604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">NAFTA was the worst trade deal in history, and China’s entrance into the World Trade Organization has enabled the greatest jobs theft in history.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7605"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7606"></td>
        <td id="LC7606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was also Bill Clinton who lobbied for China’s disastrous entry into the World Trade Organization, and Hillary Clinton who backed that terrible agreement.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7607"></td>
        <td id="LC7607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, as Secretary of State, Hillary Clinton stood by idly while China cheated on its currency, added another trillion dollars to our trade deficits, and stole hundreds of billions of dollars in our intellectual property.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7608"></td>
        <td id="LC7608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The city of Pittsburgh, and the State of Pennsylvania, have lost one-third of their manufacturing jobs since the Clintons put China into the WTO.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7609"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7610"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L7612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7612"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7613"></td>

        <td id="L7614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7614"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7615"></td>
        <td id="LC7615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To understand why trade reform creates jobs, we need to understand how all nations grow and prosper.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7616"></td>
        <td id="LC7616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Massive trade deficits subtract directly from our Gross Domestic Product.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7617"></td>
        <td id="LC7617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">From 1947 to 2001 – a span of over five decades – our inflation-adjusted gross domestic product grew at a rate of 3.5%.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7618"></td>
        <td id="LC7618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">However, since 2002 – the year after we fully opened our markets to Chinese imports – that GDP growth rate has been cut almost in half.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7619"></td>
        <td id="LC7619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What does this mean for Americans? For every one percent of GDP growth we fail to generate in any given year, we also fail to create over one million jobs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7620"></td>
        <td id="LC7620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">America’s “job creation deficit” due to slower growth since 2002 is well over 20 million jobs – and that’s just about the number of jobs our country needs right now to put America back to work at decent wages.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7621"></td>
        <td id="LC7621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Transpacific-Partnership is the greatest danger yet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7622"></td>
        <td id="LC7622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The TPP would be the death blow for American manufacturing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7623"></td>
        <td id="LC7623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It would give up all of our economic leverage to an international commission that would put the interests of foreign countries above our own.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7624"></td>
        <td id="LC7624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It would further open our markets to aggressive currency cheaters. It would make it easier for our trading competitors to ship cheap subsidized goods into U.S. markets – while allowing foreign countries to continue putting barriers in front of our exports.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7625"></td>
        <td id="LC7625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The TPP would lower tariffs on foreign cars, while leaving in place the foreign practices that keep American cars from being sold overseas. The TPP even created a backdoor for China to supply car parts for automobiles made in Mexico.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7626"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7627"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7631"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7638"></td>
        <td id="LC7638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A Trump Administration will change our failed trade policy – quickly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7639"></td>
        <td id="LC7639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here are 7 steps I would pursue right away to bring back our jobs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7640"></td>
        <td id="LC7640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One: I am going to withdraw the United States from the Trans-Pacific Partnership, which has not yet been ratified.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7641"></td>
        <td id="LC7641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two: I’m going to appoint the toughest and smartest trade negotiators to fight on behalf of American workers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7642"></td>
        <td id="LC7642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Three: I’m going to direct the Secretary of Commerce to identify every violation of trade agreements a foreign country is currently using to harm our workers. I will then direct all appropriate agencies to use every tool under American and international law to end these abuses.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7643"></td>
        <td id="LC7643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Four: I’m going tell our NAFTA partners that I intend to immediately renegotiate the terms of that agreement to get a better deal for our workers. And I don’t mean just a little bit better, I mean a lot better. If they do not agree to a renegotiation, then I will submit notice under Article 2205 of the NAFTA agreement that America intends to withdraw from the deal.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7644"></td>
        <td id="LC7644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Five: I am going to instruct my Treasury Secretary to label China a currency manipulator. Any country that devalues their currency in order to take advantage of the United States will be met with sharply</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7645"></td>
        <td id="LC7645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Six: I am going to instruct the U.S. Trade Representative to bring trade cases against China, both in this country and at the WTO. China’s unfair subsidy behavior is prohibited by the terms of its entrance to the WTO, and I intend to enforce those rules.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7646"></td>
        <td id="LC7646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seven: If China does not stop its illegal activities, including its theft of American trade secrets, I will use every lawful presidential power to remedy trade disputes, including the application of tariffs consistent with Section 201 and 301 of the Trade Act of 1974 and Section 232 of the Trade Expansion Act of 1962.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7647"></td>
        <td id="LC7647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">President Reagan deployed similar trade measures when motorcycle and semiconductor imports threatened U.S. industry. His tariff on Japanese motorcycles was 45% and his tariff to shield America’s semiconductor industry was 100%.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7648"></td>
        <td id="LC7648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hillary Clinton, and her campaign of fear, will try to spread the lie that these actions will start a trade war. She has it completely backwards.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7649"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7650"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7651"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7652"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7653"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7654"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7655"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7656"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7657"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7658"></td>
        <td id="LC7658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We will also get rid of wasteful rules and regulations which are destroying our job creation capacity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7659"></td>
        <td id="LC7659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Many people think that these regulations are an even greater impediment than the fact that we are one of the highest taxed nations in the world.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7660"></td>
        <td id="LC7660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We are also going to fully capture America’s tremendous energy capacity. This will create vast profits for our workers and begin reducing our deficit. Hillary Clinton wants to shut down energy production and shut down the mines.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7661"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7662"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7663"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7664"></td>
        <td id="LC7664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It will be American steel that sends our skyscrapers soaring into the sky.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7665"></td>
        <td id="LC7665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It will be American steel that rebuilds our inner cities.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7666"></td>
        <td id="LC7666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It will be American hands that remake this country, and it will be American energy – mined from American resources – that powers this country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7667"></td>

      </tr>
